name: 曾添文
objective: 本課程在介紹及闡述化學原理及物質之性質，著重於現代化學理論及概念之導入。內容包括氣體、計量化學、原子結構、化學鍵、物質狀態、能量轉換、酸鹼理論、氧化還原反應、金屬及非金屬元素、核化學。
schedule:
1.原子、分子、離子:
2.計量化學: chemical formulas and equations, solution stoichiometry
3.能量轉換: energy,enthalpy, P-V work, caloimetry
4.原子結構: atomic orbitals, electron
5.週期表: ionization energy, sizes of atoms and ions, group trends
6.化學鍵: ionic and covalent bonding, bond polarity, lectronegativity
7.氣體: pressure, partial pressures, ideal gas equation
8.物質狀態: vapor pressure, structure of solid
9.現代材料: medicine, electronics, optics, nanotechnology
10.溶液性質: colligative properties
11.酸鹼理論: acids and bases and its properties, Lewis acids and bases
12.環境化學: atmosphere, fresh water
13.電化學: voltaic cells, cell emf, batteries, electrolysis,氧化、還原
14.非金屬元素: 3A~8A elements
15.金屬元素: metallic bonding, alloy, transition metals
16.有機及生物化學:hydrocarbon, carbonyl group, carbohydrates
scorePolicy:
期中考:30%
平常小考:30%
期末考:40%
materials:
書籍: Chemistry
版數及出版年: tenth edition (2010), Mc Graw Hill Higher Eduacation
作者: Raymond Chang
